Invocation Name: eformsign
Developer Terms of Use
des:
eformsign is a cloud-based electronic document service that makes it easy for anyone who is not a developer to make all the documents used by an enterprise, from the beginning to an electronic document, which can be used for business purposes and safely stored.
eformsign supports all life-cycles from generation of electronic documents-> distribution-> storage-> utilization.
Paper documents of various kinds of complicated and various tasks!
You can do business with voice and chatbot, which is the most convenient document creation method.
Now, with intelligent eformsign, you can quickly and easily digitize your electronic documents in a single process - from electronic creation to electronic approval / archiving / utilization!
